xwikidoc.name: OfficeImporter
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: $services.localization.render('xe.officeimporter.import.title')
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity output="false"}} #macro (officeImporterForm) #set ($targetReference = $services.model.resolveDocument($request.page)) #set ($targetPageIsNested = $targetReference.name == $services.model.getEntityReference('DOCUMENT', 'default').name) #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.OfficeImporter')) #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.OfficeImporter')) {{html clean="false"}}
## ## Left part ##
#officeImporterForm_officeDocument() #officeImporterForm_targetPage() #if ($xwiki.exists($targetReference)) #officeImporterForm_overwriteContent() #end
## ## Right part ##
#officeImporterForm_filterStyles() #officeImporterForm_splitDocument() #officeImporterForm_headingLevelsToSplit() #officeImporterForm_childPagesNamingMethod() #officeImporterForm_terminalChildPages()
## ## Hidden inputs ## ## Normalize the parent reference of the new document so that even in a subwiki it points to the current wiki. #set ($normalizedParentReference = $services.model.resolveDocument("$!request.parent", 'current')) ## ## Form action buttons ##
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('cancel'))
{{/html}} #end #macro (officeImporterForm_officeDocument) ## FIXME: The following list of file name extensions and media types are duplicated from the office resource reference ## picker (templates/html_displayer/officeresourcereference/edit.vm). #set ($officeFileNameExtensions = $stringtool.join([ '.doc', '.docx', '.xls', '.xlsx', '.ppt', '.pptx', '.odt', '.ott', '.fodt', '.ods', '.ots', '.fods', '.odp', '.otp', '.fodp', '.sxw', '.sxc', '.sxi' ], ',')) #set ($officeMediaTypes = $stringtool.join([ 'application/msword', 'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'application/vnd.ms-powerpoint', 'application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.', 'application/vnd.sun.xml.' ], ','))
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('office.import.document.hint'))
#end #macro (officeImporterForm_targetPage)
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('office.import.target.hint'))
#template('hierarchy_macros.vm') #hierarchy($targetReference)
#end #macro (officeImporterForm_overwriteContent)
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('office.import.overwriteContent.hint'))
#officeImporterForm_confirmationModal({ 'cssClass': 'confirmation-overwriteContent', 'title': 'office.import.overwriteContent', 'message': 'office.import.overwriteContent.confirmationMessage', 'action': 'office.import.overwriteContent.confirmationAction' })
#end #macro (officeImporterForm_confirmationModal $config)
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render($config.title))
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render($config.message))
#end #macro (officeImporterForm_filterStyles)
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('xe.officeimporter.import.help.styles'))
#end #macro (officeImporterForm_splitDocument)
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('xe.officeimporter.import.help.splitting'))
#end #macro (officeImporterForm_headingLevelsToSplit)
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('office.import.headingLevelsToSplit.hint'))
#end #macro (officeImporterForm_childPagesNamingMethod) ## Hide the field when the target page is nested (not terminal) because the only logical strategy in this case is to ## use "headingNames". It creates pages as children of the target, which seems to be the correct way in the nested ## pages paradigm. The other choices have no sense: ## - "mainPageNameAndHeading" will create pages called "WebHome-Title1" instead of "targetPage/Title1". ## - "mainPageNameAndNumbering" will create pages called "WebHome-1" instead of "targetPage/1". ## In both cases, the "WebHome" part of the names is meaningless. $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('office.import.childPagesNaming.hint'))
#end #macro (officeImporterForm_terminalChildPages) #set ($hidden = !($targetPageIsNested && ($isAdvancedUser || $isSuperAdmin))) $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('office.import.terminalChildPages.hint'))
#end #macro (officeImporter_translationWithLink $key $linkTarget) #set ($targetSyntax = 'xwiki/2.1') #set ($translation = $services.localization.render($key, $targetSyntax, ['LINKSTART', 'LINKEND'])) #set ($linkLabel = $stringtool.substringBetween($translation, 'LINKSTART', 'LINKEND')) #if ($linkLabel) #set ($escapedLinkLabel = $services.rendering.escape($linkLabel, $targetSyntax)) #set ($escapedLinkTarget = $services.rendering.escape($linkTarget, $targetSyntax)) $translation.replace("LINKSTART${linkLabel}LINKEND", "[[$escapedLinkLabel>>$escapedLinkTarget]]") #else $services.localization.render($key, $targetSyntax, ['', '']) #end #end {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} #if ("$!request.page" == '') {{error}} ## This page does not propose to select the target page anymore. The create action should be used instead. ## Note: The link points to the main page because the user might not have create right on the current "XWiki" space, ## which is reserved anyway for technical pages. #set ($createURL = $xwiki.getURL($services.wiki.currentWikiDescriptor.mainPageReference, 'create', 'type=office')) #officeImporter_translationWithLink('office.form.error.noDocument' "path:$createURL") {{/error}} #else ## Hide UI elements that are not needed for office import. #set ($displayContentMenu = false) #set ($displayContentFooter = false) #set ($displayDocExtra = false) #if ($isguest) {{error}}$services.localization.render('xe.officeimporter.notallowed', 'xwiki/2.1'){{/error}} #elseif (!$services.officemanager.isConnected()) #if ($hasAdmin) {{error}} #set ($documentationURL = 'http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/Extension/Office%20Importer%20Application') #officeImporter_translationWithLink('xe.officeimporter.error.adminuser' $documentationURL) {{/error}} #else {{error}}$services.localization.render('xe.officeimporter.error.normaluser', 'xwiki/2.1'){{/error}} #end #else #officeImporterForm() #end #end {{/velocity}}
